ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to create a NonUnoformHeatmap with Text in the cells SciChart. Accepts a 2D Array of data and has a user-defined colour map which can be displayed as a legend over the chart.
ExampleDefinition.Description: Demonstrates how to create a NonUnoformHeatmap with Text in the cells SciChart. Accepts a 2D Array of data.
